attributes.action: Urgent! Chancellor should not cut 50% tax rate next week.
attributes.additional_details:
This proposed tax cut for the most wealthy in our society is an ignoble and uncivilised disgrace for the following reasons:
The very poorest in our society are being deprived of services, protection and dignity.
Our children are being deprived of the opportunity to work for a living and become the leaders of their own generation.
Our elderly are made to work and upon becoming dependent are stripped of everything they have ever managed to earn or save for.
